text: The Dutch municipality Appingedam is divided into districts and neighbourhoods for statistical purposes. The municipality is divided into the following statistical districts: * Wijk 00 (CBS-districtcode:000300) A statistical district may consist of several neighbourhoods. The table below shows the neighbourhood division with characteristic values according to the Statistics Netherlands (CBS, 2008): |} ==References== Category:Appingedam Category:Lists of neighborhoods in Dutch municipalities
title: Districts and neighbourhoods of Appingedam
